caseTitle: Collector of Customs Apprainment and another v. D.G. Khan Cement Co. Ltd.
tagline: The very use of Off-Highway dump trucks at the quarries makes them part and parcel of the industrial process of a cement factory, and thus such trucks fall within the definition of the respondent company's cement plant and are entitled for exemption from customs duty and sales tax. However, the date of import would determine the applicability of the customs duty and exempted duties.
